name: Contro Classic
description:
Contro Classic is a retro arcade style experience designed to test your quick thinking abilities. Are you fast enough to out maneuver the oncoming hoard of enemies, or will you be defeated?

Key features: 

  • Collect power ups to eliminate enemies.
  • Steer clear of incoming asteroids, or use their gravitational pull to your advantage.
  • Avoid the death stone.
  • Increase and decrease movement speed to improve movement control.
  • Edit controls to fit your play style.
  • Track your incredibly high scores on the high-score board.

Contact information:
